Uses of Interface
org.czeal.jsonfilter.Filter

  • Uses of Filter in org.czeal.jsonfilter

    Classes in org.czeal.jsonfilter that implement Filter
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ExclusionFilter
    A filter implementation that excludes specified JSON elements from a given JSON element.
    class 
    InclusionFilter
    A filter implementation that includes only specified JSON elements from a given JSON element.
    Methods in org.czeal.jsonfilter that return Filter
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Filter
    FilterFactory.create(FilterType type)
    Creates a filter based on the given filter type.
